title: Tokyo Ghoul 10th Anniversary Complete Blu-Ray Box Set Is Up For Preorder At Amazon

description: We've seen Ghost Face in a number of video games already, namely Dead By Daylight, Among Us, and Call of Duty: Warzone. Now, the iconic killer first seen in Wes Craven's 1996 genre-defying film, Scream, is coming to a new game. On October 24, you can find Ghost Face in Hunt: Showdown as the western-horror extraction shooter gets its debut licensed character skin.
title: Hunt: Showdown Gets Its First Crossover Character With This Legendary Horror Villain

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 arrives on October 25, and it will launch with a new DLC that supports charity. The in-game store will include the Call of Duty Endowment Endeavour: Tracer Pack, with all proceeds supporting military veterans.

Similar to previous Call of Duty Endowment bundles, all proceeds from the Endeavour: Tracer Pack go to Activision Blizzard's Call of Duty Endowment, which is a charity that helps US and UK military veterans find new civilian jobs after leaving the service.

The bundle includes the Endowment's first-ever U.K. operator skin called "SC1," as well as two unique weapon blueprints. The full bundle details are as follows:

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Launches With DLC To Support Military Veterans

description: The special illustrated omnibus edition of Ursula K. Le Guinn's acclaimed Earthsea fantasy series is nearly 50% off at Amazon right now. The Books of Earthsea: The Complete Illustrated Edition contains all six mainline novels and all of the short stories and other writings set within the Earthsea universe. You can pick up the hardcover omnibus for $31.48 (was $60). It's also part of Amazon's buy one, get one 50%-off book sale, so check out the full sale at Amazon to see if there's another book you want to pair it with before the promotion ends October 26.
title: Ursula K. Le Guinn's Award-Winning Earthsea Illustrated Omnibus Is Only $31 At Amazon

description:
Earlier this month, Tom Holland revealed that he and Zendaya have already read an early draft for Spider-Man 4, which excited both of them. While Holland hasn't shared what aspect of the script "lit a fire" in him, he has reiterated his desire to share the MCU screen with Marvel's younger Spider-Man, Miles Morales.

Before Holland touched upon his hope for a Peter Parker/Miles Morales team-up, he shared a story on Rich Roll's YouTube show about the way Robert Downey Jr. advocated for him during his first MCU appearance as Peter Parker in Captain America: Civil War.

"When I got to set after I'd got the gig and... I was meeting Marissa [Tomei] for the first time, and I was now working with the Russos and Downey," recalled Holland. "My scene had been cut down significantly from what I'd done in t
title: Tom Holland Wants Miles Morales To Join MCU

description:
The tepid player response to recent big-budget live-service titles has left many fans of the genre--this writer included--wondering which studio would be next to unveil a new live-service shooter in an era that is already oversaturated with them. After the striking failure of Concord, who would be brave enough to step onto the stage and attempt to sell players on their latest live-service creation?

Rather unexpectedly, the answer is 2K Games, which
title: Project Ethos Is Delightfully Different, But Struggles With Its Identity

description: It’s been ten long years since Dragon Age Inquisition, and its follow up, Dragon Age: The Veilguard, is finally here.  All hell has broken loose in Thedas, but what kind of an adventure are we in for this time? Here’s everything you need to know about Dragon Age: The Veilguard.
title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Everything To Know

description:
The marketing machine for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 has been fairly active over the last month, thanks in part to actor Peter Stormare's playlist of meme-worthy Replacer adverts. Things have come full circle now, as the Replacer isn't just content with being the new Pope or a beloved sports mascot: He's now taking over for some of the biggest internet memes of all time--or at least the ones that have outlasted the 15 seconds of fame that most new memes have when they first go viral. You can see the full collection through this link.

The official Call of Duty X (formerly Twitter) account revealed that the Replacer has replaced several of your favorite memes, including all-time classics Leonardo DiCaprio Pointing, T
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6's The Replacer Has Come To Replace Your Favorite Memes

description:
For months, it's been obvious that there was no way that Marvel Studios' Blade movie was going to make its 2025 release. Now, it's official: Disney has dropped Blade from its November 7, 2025 premiere date, leaving the reboot without a spot on the Marvel film calendar.

According to Deadline, Disney's 20th Century Studios already has a movie lined up to take Blade's place. Predator: Bad Lands will inherit the November 7, 2025 release date, with Prey director Dan Tratechenberg returning to the franchise for its first theatrical film since 2018's The Predator. Elle Fanning will star in Bad Lands, but plot details about the sequel have yet to be revealed.

As for Blade, Mahershala Ali was announced as the star at Comic-Con 2019. Aside from a quick voca
title: Disney Drops Blade From 2025 Release Calendar, Adds Predator Movie
Sonic X Shadow Generations Deluxe Edition Is Out Now, Physical Preorders Include Collectible Book

description:
One of the best video game art books has a sequel that's just around the corner. The Art of Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course will be published by Dark Horse Books on November 5. Cuphead fans have three editions to choose from: a standard hardcover, Deluxe Edition hardcover, and Kindle ebook.

The
title: Exclusive: Get A Sneak Peek At The Art Of Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course

description: A new version of the Xbox Wireless headset has been revealed, and while it doesn't make massive changes to the current model, it does introduce several helpful upgrades. Priced at $110, it's now available to order at several stores.
title: New Xbox Wireless Headset Revealed, Adds Improved Battery Life And Dolby Atmos Support

description:
Just over two years ago, Super Smash Bros. director Masahiro Sakurai launched his YouTube channel to give fans around the world an inside glimpse at game development and design. Now, Sakurai has posted his final video for the channel while teasing a new project that may be his first game since Super Smash Bros. Ultimate was released in 2018.

According to Sakurai, he was approached to work on a video game prop
title: Super Smash Bros. Director Masahiro Sakurai Teases His Next Video Game Project -- Maybe

description:
Silent Hill 2 tells the story of a fundamentally broken man, but according to players, a recent patch unfortunately appears to have broken the game itself.

Patch 1.04 was meant to improve Silent Hill 2's performance on Steam Deck, prevent crashes on PlayStation 5, and address a few of the game's other unintended flaws. But according to players on Steam and the Silent Hill subreddit, the new update has introduced a game-breaking bug to the Labyrinth level.

The Labyrinth is an underground maze of hallways located beneath Toluca Prison. Players will bump into several NPCs while exploring it (including Eddie and Angela), and will also be fac
title: New Silent Hill Patch Is Breaking The Game, But A Fix Is On The Way

description:
In a brutal year of gaming layoffs, Netflix has shut down a studio focused on an original "AAA multiplatform" title. The Southern California outfit was apparently known as team "Blue" and featured employees with experience on franchises like Halo, Overwatch, and God of War.

Game File was first to report on the closure of this Netflix gaming developer. Overwatch veteran Chacko Sonny started the studio two years ago to become Netflix's fifth in-house gaming team at that time.

In April 2023, former Halo boss Joseph Staten joined Sonny at Netflix. At the time, Staten said he was the creative
title: Netflix Shutters AAA Game Studio Led By Overwatch And Halo Vets

description:
The 16 Best Cosmic Horror Movies To Fill You With Existential Dread


It's natural to feel some trepidation about darkness. It's a survival instinct, rooted in the need to protect ourselves from very real predators. Cosmic horror is a little different: The only present danger the blackness of space presents is its inhospitable nature, and that only matters to the scientists (and billionaires) going up there. And yet, we still look at the blackness of space and find things to be afraid of. That's where cosmic horror, the genre pioneered by H.P. Lovecraft, comes from.

We like to think of humanity as being the center of the universe. As far as we can tell thus far, we are. Not in that the Earth is the center around which the universe spins, but in that we haven't yet found any confirmed signs of life and, thus, can really only worry a
title: The 16 Best Cosmic Horror Movies To Fill You With Existential Dread

description:
The release date of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 may not be a national holiday, but that won't stop some players from coming up with an excuse to stay home from work that day. That's the entire idea behind Activision's character, The Replacer. As played by Until Dawn's Peter Stormare (and occasionally other performers), The Replacer steps in when people need to play Call of Duty. This past weekend, one of the Replacers actually tagged in for the Los Angeles Rams' mascot during an NFL game.

The Replacer took over for the LA Ra
title: Black Ops 6's Replacer Is Even Replacing NFL Mascots Now

description: Square Enix is entering the console gaming space, but not in the way that you were expecting. The home of Final Fantasy has had a big merchandising arm for decades now, and it has just unveiled a new line of collectibles based on classic Sega consoles. The only catch? You won't be booting up any games on these Sega Saturn or Genesis consoles, as they're adorably tiny replicas of the original machines. Priced at $44 each, they're expected to start shipping out on July 16, 2025.
title: Square Enix Is Making Adorable (Fake) Sega Consoles, And They're Now Available To Preorder
